articles.title: 🔥 Webp images shown for all mail clients that support them
articles.desc: Changed the HTML tests for Outlook hiding the webp images for modern mail clients too. They are now shown when the mail client supports them.

articles.title: 🔥 Support for webp images
articles.desc: Webp images of content inserted in emails can now be automatically resized if the server supports it.

articles.title: 🔥 Background customization for each column
articles.desc: We added the possibility to change the display of the background image when you create a template and you can now add background on each column individually.

articles.title: 🔥 Better UI when using mass actions on listings
articles.desc: The number of affected elements and their type is now shown in the confirmation box, when mass-disabling subscribers for example.

articles.title: 🎨 Better UI when using mass actions on listings
articles.desc: The number of affected elements and their type is now shown in the confirmation box, when mass-disabling subscribers for example.

articles.title: 🎨 Better flow when creating special campaigns
articles.desc: When confirming a birthday campaign or returning to the listing from any step, you are now redirected to the birthday campaigns listing instead of the general listing.

articles.title: 🎨 Improved security on subscriber edition page
articles.desc: Added a security on statistics calculation in subscriber edition page to avoid deformed interfaces in some cases.

articles.title: 🎨 Compatibility with custom admin URLs
articles.desc: A new option has been added in the configuration to allow a better compatibility with websites having a custom admin URL.

articles.title: 🎨 Better AcyMailing 5 data migration
articles.desc: The AcyMailing 5 data migration script has been improved to handle more cases like the front-end edition capabilities.

splash_content.title: DISCOVER WHAT CHANGED FOR BUG FIXES

articles.title: 🛠️ Custom CSS Editor Now Displays Stored Value Accurately upon Reopening
articles.desc: The custom CSS option in the editor now correctly shows the stored value when re-opening the editor.

articles.title: 🛠️ Scheduled emails sending progress now displayed
articles.desc: Fixed the queue process not showing the progress of scheduled emails.

articles.title: 🛠️ Better sending service error handling
articles.desc: The email sendings don't count as failed for the recipients anymore when it is related to the sending service account (account suspended, no more credit, etc...).

articles.title: 🛠️ Fixed line chart
articles.desc: Fixed the statistics line chart not showing November when the filter by month is active.

articles.title: 🧩 Better subscription module compatibility
articles.desc: New options to load the subscription module scripts have been added to improve compatibility with some websites.

articles.title: 🧩 Better multilingual sites support
articles.desc: The language code used for links of inserted articles (articles with a restricted access) now takes the custom value set by the admin.

articles.title: 🧩 Better compatibility with Joomla 4 and 5
articles.desc: Added compatibility with Joomla 4+ for the VirtueMart trigger on order placed for the automation trigger.

articles.title: 🧩 Restored click tracking for auto-login links
articles.desc: The links to articles when the auto-login is enabled are now correctly tracked when click tracking is enabled.

articles.title: 🧩 Some front-end management irregularities have been addressed
articles.desc: The creation of new campaigns from the front-end management menu has been fixed in some cases regarding access rights.

articles.title: 🧩 Fixed the Seblod content insertion compatibility with automatic campaigns
articles.desc: Fixed the newly created option in Seblod content insertion for automatic campaigns.

articles.title: 🧩 Better date format for The Events Calendar
articles.desc: Dates for inserted events from The Events Calendar in emails now use the same date format as the plugin for better consistency.

articles.title: 🧩 Confirmation email for Elementor forms
articles.desc: Fixed the Elementor form integration that was not sending the confirmation email.
